A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is the perfect example of why professional reviews are no longer trusted with major blockbuster movies that a major studio considers 'critically important'.  Even the "super reviewers" from the audience side of things\, seem to have been into the koolaid (or screened a different movie).

Why bother calling this a trilogy if each movie is going to abruptly\, without any merit or gravitas\, end storylines that were run throughout the previous movie?  I guess it is just easier to write these as stand alone stories.  Or in other words\, at the highschool level.

EDIT - Just saw a spoiler-filled YouTube video on everything that makes this movie cringe-worthy.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cL5oCP0VIEI

I guess I had mentally blocked the memory of Luke sucking on an ugly Blue alien's nipples for a few laughs.  Now I wish I could forget again...
